Room.Name: Ashton River Bridge
Room.ShortDescription: The bridge is a part of Lelion Way running east and west.
Room.LongDescription: Directly to the east is the intersection of Lelion Way and Riverdell Way. Below is the Ashton River, which runs north/south at this part of its course. A sign on the bridge says to beware of trolls who have been known to accost travelers at this point of their journey. In the South you can see the Ashton Waterfalls, a spectacular sight visited by locals and tourists alike.
